ProfilingÂ¶

Is it possible to record additional runtime information during the test, in order to profile the performance of the program.

Warning

The included profiling facilities are intended for providing ballpark estimates of the runtime of a program. NO definitive conclusions about the efficiency of a program must be drawn from them. Consider using an external profiler to determine more accurate performance information.

The metrics recorded during profiling are:

  • Total run time, using the built-in time module

  • Resident Set Size, as a measure of memory usage. Obtained with psutil

To profile the code, simply wrap the relevant part of the algorithm with

recorder.start_profiling()
    # Find plan
recorder.end_profiling()

MAPFbench
